metadata.title: RHSA-2023:4178: java-1.8.0-openjdk security and bug fix update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The java-1.8.0-openjdk packages provide the OpenJDK 8 Java Runtime Environment and the OpenJDK 8 Java Software Development Kit.

Security Fix(es):

* OpenJDK: improper handling of slash characters in URI-to-path conversion (8305312) (CVE-2023-22049)

* OpenJDK: array indexing integer overflow issue (8304468) (CVE-2023-22045)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Bug Fix(es):

* Prepare for the next quarterly OpenJDK upstream release (2023-07, 8u382) [rhel-9] (BZ#2220662)

bugzilla.text: OpenJDK: array indexing integer overflow issue (8304468)
OpenJDK: improper handling of slash characters in URI-to-path conversion (8305312)
